revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Ilex Forest |image = [[File:Ilex Forest.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Ilex Forest. |tokens = 4,000 |location = On route 34. }} '''Ilex Forest''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 82,200 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Caterpie.png|40px]] Caterpie || rowspan=8|[[File:Bug_Catcher.png|40px]] Bug Catcher Wayne || rowspan=8|[[File:Ledyba.png|40px]] Ledyba, [[File:Paras.png|40px]] Paras |- | [[File:Metapod.png|40px]] Metapod |- | [[File:Weedle.png|40px]] Weedle |- | [[File:Kakuna.png|40px]] Kakuna |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Oddish.png|40px]] Oddish |- | [[File:Paras.png|40px]] Paras |- | [[File:Hoothoot.png|40px]] Hoothoot |- |}
<!--T:5--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Noctowl.png|40px]] Noctowl || rowspan=3| <center>340,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=4|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Beedrill.png|40px]] Beedrill |- | [[File:Butterfree.png|40px]] Butterfree |- | [[File:Celebi.png|40px]] '''Celebi*''' || <center> 800,000 |}
<!--T:6--> '''*Note:''' Must be Johto Champion and do [[Quests#Unfinished Business|Unfinished Business]] Quest first.
==Items== <!--T:7-->
<tabs> <!--T:8--> <tab name="No Debuff">
<!--T:9--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 2 || 52.07% || 50.63% || 44.44% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 26.03% || 25.32% || 22.22% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 20.85% || 22.14% || 27.72% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.11% |- | {{Bag2|Insect Plate}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.11% |- | {{Bag2|Medium Restore}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.11% |- | {{Bag2|Silver Powder}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.11% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Zap Plate}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.23% || 1.18% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:10-->
<!--T:11--> After Reaching Unova, the drop chance for items in Johto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:12--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 2 || 50.45% || 50.45% || 50.45% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 25.23% || 25.23% || 25.23% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 24.22% || 24.22% || 24.22% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Insect Plate}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Medium Restore}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Silver Powder}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Zap Plate}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |} </tab> </tabs>
